channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 16:51 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky Territorial Community-Mirorsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 16:51 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky Territorial Community-Mirorsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
